imdb.plot outline: JARGON is an animated Urban American comedy series created by Rick Motion Estrada. The show revolves around a group of misfits living within LA County whose native tongue or "jargon" is a part of who they are. JARGON exposes urban life for what it is and shows why "it's all good in the hood."
imdb.title: Jargon
plot: JARGON is an animated Urban American comedy series created by Rick Motion Estrada. JARGON exposes urban life for what it is and shows why "it's all good in the hood."::_Jargon_ (qv) Studios
